title: Beltrunner-Tie Advanced Variant
wikitext:
[[File:Beltrunner-Tie-Advanced-Variant.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''Craft''': Modified SFS TIE Advanced
'''Type''': Refurbished externally-shielded asteroid runner
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 9.1 meters
'''Skill''': SF piloting: TIE
'''Crew''': 1
'''Crew Skill''': SF piloting 4D
'''Passengers''': None
'''Cargo Capacity''': 25 kilograms
'''Consumables''': 5 days
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x2
'''Nav Computer''': Limited (4 jumps)
'''Maneuverability''': 2D+2
'''Space''': 9                  
'''Atmosphere''': 415; 1200 kmh
'''Hull''': 3D
'''Shields''': Externally provided - see [[Belt-Runner I]]
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 10/1D *Search: 20/2D *Scan: 35/3D *Focus: 3/4D '''Weapons''': None '''Capsule''': This craft has repulsorlift generators which allow it to bounce off of asteroids when activated.This craft is a refitted TIE Advanced used in Lando Calrissian's asteroid belt course. It can bounce off of asteroids as well as receive shield transmissions from Belt-Runner I.
